content: the pattern consists of two youtube tutorials part 1 head & rocky edge sun 31 march at 17 00bst part 2 base & nose sun 7 april at 17 00bst you will need 2mm hook stylecraft special dk in mocha grey graphite and powder pink or wisteria to make a shiny 8mm black oval safety eyes toy filling pins to place pieces before sewing together needle stitch markers i prefer using scrap yarn as stitch markers
